Author: ShiversDar
Title: [ANN][PreSale]Shivers Token - Horror Film Platform
Body: SHIVERS.IO  SHIVERS  Blockchain meets the horror genre Horror films just got scarier with the help of blockchain technology.  Legendary filmmakers Massive Audience (1.7 Million followers) Creative Freedom Blockchain-driven distribution platform  What is Shivers Token?  An ERC20 token which fuels an innovative platform for financing and distributing horror films. Shivers aims to set the standard for the way exclusive movies are presented to the audience using blockchain technology.   Redeemable for digital content Shivers can purchase digital items on our marketplace such as movies and future content.  Escapes an outdated system The film industry struggles to generate quality content due to the demands of financing. We will take power awayfrom the boardroom and give it back to the filmmakers. This will allow filmmakers to truly operate within their own creative space without any restraints. The audience should expect to see some very creative and exciting projects.  Circle of life Shivers will exist in a perpetual cycle due to the limited supply and the requirement of their use as a pass-key to our platform. Over time the supply of Shivers decreases due to the use of the token as a pass-key.   http://shivers.io/ann/whatisshivers.JPG  http://shivers.io/ann/team.JPG  http://shivers.io/ann/Allocation.JPG  http://shivers.io/ann/roadmap.JPG Bounty thread coming soon!!

Author: yluna88
Title: [ANN][PreSale]Shivers Token - Horror Film Platform
Body: Hello, I have 4 questions...  1) the rate now is 1 eth for 10,000 tokens and not as per the first post in this thread? 2) during this pre-sale is there a minimum purchase amount? for example i buy 200 tokens and receive 200 purcahsed tokens + 400 bonus tokens? 3) there is no registration during this pre-sale, right? to participate, one just need to send eth to the address on the website/white paper. is this correct? 4) how about KYC later on, is there any and is it going to be a tedious process?  Hope to get answers to the above. I am sure many are wondering of the same issues. Thank you and have a good day...

Author: JHenriP
Title: [ANN][PreSale]Shivers Token - Horror Film Platform
Body: Sorry for the delay, didn't notice your post. Dar Warison (Shivers Founder) is connected to the industry, he spotted a potential use of the blockchain and here we are! Being part of the industry brings huge huge benefits starting by our partners.

Author: JHenriP
Title: [ANN][PreSale]Shivers Token - Horror Film Platform
Body: Hello, thanks for reaching.  1) 1eth - 10000shivers 2) No minimum purchase amount 3) No registration 4) The KYC won't be a tedious process. It's a simple registration and confirmation of location to help us ensure our buyers are from where they say they are.

Author: JHenriP
Title: [ANN][PreSale]Shivers Token - Horror Film Platform
Body: ---IMPORTANT---  Residents of the following countries are not eligible to participate in the token sale: Afghanistan, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Central African Republic, China, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Guinea-Bissau, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Lebanon, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, Uganda, Vanuatu, and Yemen. If you reside in the New York State in the United States of America, you are not entitled to participate in the token sale due to state regulation. If you reside in Crimea, you are not entitled to participate in the token sale
